name: Ext_R5_QuestionnaireResponse_source
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.QuestionnaireResponse.source for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents QuestionnaireResponse.source from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/QuestionnaireResponse|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: The individual or device that answered the questions
element.definition: The individual or device that answered the questions about the subject.
element.comment: `QuestionnaireResponse.source` maps to R4B `QuestionnaireResponse.source`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Device)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Organization)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: The individual or device that answered the questions
